verses.name: 2 Chronicles 24:1
verses.text: Joash was seven years old when he began to reign, and he reigned forty years in Jerusalem. His mother’s name also was Zibiah of Beer–sheba.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 24:2
verses.text: And Joash did that which was right in the sight of the Lord all the days of Jehoiada the priest.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 24:3
verses.text: And Jehoiada took for him two wives; and he begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 24:4
verses.text: And it came to pass after this, that Joash was minded to repair the house of the Lord.
